author: Mukul Gogoi
text:
Is creation of employment opportunities for the jobless and the gen next the answer? What type of employment? What would they produce? Who will consume? What good will it do to the future of mankind and the environment ?
Question is aimed to developing world economies. Can some of the urban modern amenities available to the world,which are proven to be contributing to the harmful affects to the environment  be done away with for your cities population? Can you grow without ? Can you resist the demand from the people?
title: Employment and growth
